SongName: Always come back to your love
Lyric:
[00:04.340]Yeah, check it out
[00:05.540]What, what, what, what
[00:07.870]Uh, you like that? Uh
[00:15.680]Come on yeah
[00:17.360]Uh, no doubt
[00:22.840]Break it
[00:24.700]I've been up and down (uh, what)
[00:28.960]Been going round and round (uh)
[00:33.400]I've been all over town (wha-what,uh)
[00:38.560]But I'll never ever find somebody new for sure
[00:43.500](Yes, yes you are, left to right, yes
[00:46.010]Yes you are and rock you all night)
[00:48.030]Show me where I belong tonight (all night)
[00:52.830]Give me a reason to stay
[00:56.980]No matter if I go left or right (left to right)
[01:01.470]I always come back to your love
[01:10.370]I've been high and low (uh)
[01:14.560]I don't know where to go (no, baby)
[01:19.090]Because I love you so (you like that)
[01:23.810]And I'll never ever find someone like you for sure
[01:29.060](Yes, yes you are, left to right, yes
[01:31.190]Yes you are and rock you all night)
[01:33.650]Show me where I belong tonight (all night)
[01:38.260]Give me a reason to stay (I need a reason, yeah)
[01:42.540]No matter if I go left or right (left to right)
[01:47.030]I always come back to your love
[01:54.640](Back to your love, yeah)
[01:56.470]Woah
[02:00.880]No matter if I go left or right (left to right)
[02:05.300]I always come back to your love (yeah)
[02:14.820]Woah
[02:19.900]Show me love tonight
[02:21.360]I'm going left to right
[02:23.690]No matter where I go
[02:25.940]I always find your love
[02:29.460]Show me where I belong tonight (you like that)
[02:34.300]Give me a reason to stay
[02:38.530]No matter if I go left or right
[02:43.130]I always come back to your love
[02:48.350]Show me where I belong tonight (all night)
[02:52.479]Give me a reason to stay
[02:56.700]No matter if I go left or right (left to right)
[03:01.190]I always come back to your love
[03:08.580](back you love, you like that?)
[03:10.790]Woah
[03:13.270](let's go)
[03:15.130]Woah
[03:18.690](Show me)
[03:19.280]I always come back to your love 
[03:26.550]
